about_the_game:
Overview:
The "Lewd Upgrade!" DLC is an optional extension for "Bancroft Academy," catering to players who appreciate the game's original mature themes. This DLC complements the recent evolution of the base game, which now welcomes a wider audience with its magical narrative.

A New Chapter for Bancroft Academy:
With its updated content, Bancroft Academy invites a diverse range of players to explore its magical world. The base game maintains a focus on story and character, suitable for all.

The Role of "Lewd Upgrade!" DLC:
This DLC is designed for those familiar with the game's original version, reintegrating mature themes in line with the initial vision. For new players, it offers an alternative experience, deepening the narrative with mature elements.

What You Can Expect:

  • Restored Mature Themes: The DLC reintroduces the mature aspects of the storyline and character relationships.
  • Enhanced Narrative Depth: We continue to develop content that enriches the adult visual novel experience, including updates to EP1 and the new EP2.
  • Meaningful Integration: The adult scenes are thoughtfully integrated, adding depth to the overall narrative.
  • Seamless Experience: This DLC integrates with the existing storyline, offering a complete experience for those seeking the mature version of Bancroft Academy.

A Note to Our Community:
As Bancroft Academy grows, we're pleased to offer experiences that resonate with all our players. The "Lewd Upgrade!" DLC remains an option for those desiring the mature version, while the base game now caters to a broader audience. This approach allows us to share Bancroft Academy's magical story with more players, honoring the preferences of our diverse community.

content_descriptors.notes: By downloading the 'Lewd Upgrade!' DLC for 'Bancroft Academy,' you add mature content including explicit scenes of sex, suitable only for adults. All sexual acts depicted are consensual, emphasizing a storyline for an audience that appreciates depth and intricacy.
